content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Hello Ryanah Rahman, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am looking for the highest possible rental price for this property, so let's discuss the details.

The apartment is 25 square meters in size and is located in a prime location. It is fully furnished and equipped with all modern amenities. The rent is negotiable, but I am looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the property.

What rental price are you willing to offer for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to offer 300 Euros per month for the apartment. 

I hope this is a fair price. Is this a good offer?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Ryanah. I appreciate your willingness to rent the apartment from me.

I must say that your offer of 300 Euros per month is quite low, considering the size and location of the apartment. I am looking for a price that reflects the value of the property and provides me with a reasonable return on investment.

I would like to suggest a higher rental price of 400 Euros per month. This is a fair price that takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the value of the property.

If you are unable to agree to this rental price, I would have to decline your offer and continue my search for a better tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am sorry, I am not able to offer 400 Euros per month. The maximum amount I can offer is 300 Euros per month. Is there a way we can come to an agreement? 

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price, but I also want to be fair to the landlord. 

I hope you understand my situation.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
I understand your situation, Ryanah. It's important to find a fair price that works for both of us.

In that case, I am willing to accept your offer of 300 Euros per month for the apartment. While it may not be the highest price I was looking for, it is still a fair and reasonable rental price.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a mutually beneficial solution. Let's move forward with the rental agreement and sign the lease.
name: Heinrich Heine
